jdxi_editor.jdxi.midi.constant

Midi and JD-Xi Constant definitions

Classes

MidiConstant

Miscellaneous MIDI constants for JD-Xi communication.

JDXiConstant

JD-Xi-specific MIDI and SysEx constants.
